extendedInfo.description: Do you want always stay update with the latest News on NHL??NHL News is the application that keeps you updated on National Hockey League, giving you the latest news on matches, divisions, transfers, teams and players.- News from major newspaper: Yahoo, Bleacher Report, CBS Sport, Sport Illustrated, Usa Today, ESPN, NHL.com.- All the Teams from all the divisions!!!  -> Atlantic: New Jersey Devils, New York Islanders, New York Rangers, Philadelphia Flyers, Pittsburgh Penguins  -> Northeast: Boston Bruins , Buffalo Sabres, Montreal Canadiens, Ottawa Senators, Toronto Maple Leafs  -> Southeast: Carolina Hurricanes, Florida Panthers, Tampa Bay Lightning, Washington Capitals, Winnipeg Jets  -> Central: Chicago Blackhawks, Columbus Blue Jackets, Detroit Red Wings, Nashville Predators, St. Louis Blues  -> Northwest: Calgary Flames, Colorado Avalanche, Edmonton Oilers, Minnesota Wild , Vancouver Canucks  -> Pacific: Anaheim Ducks, Dallas Stars, Los Angeles Kings, Phoenix Coyotes, San Jose SharksA lot of new FEATURES: - Offline reading - Share favourite stories with your friends via email, tweet, Facebook or SMS - Save your favorite stories - Specific tablet layoutFollow us on Facebook (facebook.com/fflabs), Twitter (twitter.com/fflabs) or Google Plus (plus.google.com/u/0/104155336528065530025)!Disclaimer:We not affiliated with the NHL or any of the news providers shown within this application.Â© 2013 FF labs. All National Hockey League trademarks and copyrights used here are the property of the applicable NHL entity.All rights reserved.

reviews.comment: ... for NHL news... would be nice to show dates of news feeds
